name: Repo Man
storyline: In this quirky first-person RPG you are a debt collector. Track down debtors, claim their assets, strike deals, deceive, seduce, intimidate. Solve mysteries, uncover conspiracies and dabble in the occult.
summary: Become a debt collector. Each job is different, start from district of homes where you will learn this dangerous profession, and then take on serious orders!
